101090400.Text: [An Update on the Rumor Circulating in a Certain Anonymous Chat Group Regarding the Space Station's Lead Researcher] #LatestUpdate The rumor in circulation is false and untrue. Equipment purchase records and statement information have been properly disclosed to the relevant department in the IPC. The full reports of the investigation have been posted on the Space Station's Personnel Internal Data Center. With help offered by a certain volunteer, the said rumor has been determined to be false. The Space Station Security Center has dealt with the perpetrator of this false accusation in accordance with the regulations. Furthermore, we would also like to urge all employees to remain alert to any unverified rumors and refrain from spreading them further, so that we can together build a positive social environment within the space station

101090415.Text: We need to learn to be tolerant and considerate while communicating. If there is a difference in opinion, don't fight over it, and don't act on impulse!

101090416.Text: We need to learn to be ruthless and relentless while communicating. If there's a difference in opinion, do what your gut tells you. Never back off or back down, and never admit defeat.

111090000.Text: @{NICKNAME} @March 7th @Dan Heng, the sealing of the Stellaron is complete, and the spatial distortion is dissipating. Good job.

111090003.Text: Don't rush, go at your own pace. The Express will be here, before you're ready to leave.

111090005.Text: I'm craving some juice... Pom-Pom still owes me a glass!

111090007.Text: Not great. Even though the influence of the Stellaron has basically subsided, the existing Fragmentum is too deeply rooted.

111090008.Text: The Eternal Freeze has lasted a very long time, enough to severely impact the ecology of the planet.

111090009.Text: In short, the planet probably won't regain the vitality that it once had a thousand years ago in such a short time.

111090011.Text: Is there anything else we can do?

111090012.Text: ...As Trailblazers, our mission has already concluded successfully. The fate of this world should be handed back to its inhabitants.

111090013.Text: Humankind has always struggled against austere conditions and had always managed to thrive in spite of it. Now that the Eternal Freeze is gone, the Fragmentum has lost its momentum to expand.

111090014.Text: Jarilo-VI will be revitalized. Believe in the perseverance of her people.

111090015.Text: I detected a high-frequency spatial energy surge in the north of Jarilo-VI. You might be interested in checking it out.

111090016.Text: Don't worry. That energy is not related to the Stellaron. It's only an Echo left behind after spatial distortions fade away.

111090017.Text: Inside the Echo, our perceptions of space and time that we are used to will become radically altered, to the point where it might even reconstruct certain scenes from our own past experiences.

111090018.Text: If you're in the mood and wish to re-live those memorable adventures, you can try your luck at places where Echoes can be found.

Choices.Text: We'll need to stay here a little longer
Is there anything else we can do?

111410000.Text: Hello? Hello? Any news? I'm getting antsy over here!!!

115030005.Text: Such entities may contain reality data that has practical value. Exercise extreme caution when you come into contact with it. The very nature of spatial distortion is inexplicable chaos, and it's quite difficult to tell if there are any elements of danger hidden within

115100003.Text: Remember to be thoroughly prepared before you make physical contact with them. It's not gonna be worth it if you get yourself hurt out of avarice

115110002.Text: Stagnant Shadows are entities that have been influenced by Fragmentum energy and are confined within static space-time

115110003.Text: Once external forces get involved, the space-time within the Shadows will start to flow again, meaning the imprisoned creature or monster may regain activity

115110004.Text: I wouldn't recommend anyone to make contact with the Shadows unless they are genuinely interested in certain priceless relics captured by the Shadows. Just be careful, {NICKNAME}

115120002.Text: It appears to be a rift in space, torn open by the Fragmentum as it erodes reality. The scientific name for this phenomenon is "Cavern of Corrosion"

115120003.Text: No one knows for sure what kind of space the Caverns are connected to. However, research does indicate that valuable reality data is often scattered within these Caverns

115120004.Text: As with the Calyxes, the derivatives of the Fragmentum always carry unidentified risks. Please exercise extra caution if you wish to explore further

115130000.Text: Your memory is worth a lot. If used properly, it can be even more valuable

115130002.Text: I collect fragments of the past and piece them together into a blueprint of the future

115130005.Text: Here you can relive the past and obtain treasures of the future from your past memories

115140000.Text: {NICKNAME}, we've received some assignments. Looks like some planets could use our help.

115170000.Text: {NICKNAME}, it's time to teach you how to better wield the power of your Path.

115180002.Text: Try it out. Have faith in yourself. I'm sure you can surpass even your greatest expectations.

120050200.Text: Can I trouble you for a favor? There is something I wish to discuss with another. But of all the people, you were the only suitable one.

120050201.Text: My grandfather's face has begun to sport scars of age, even though Foxians are known to be relatively unaffected by the passing of time. He must have been overly burdened.

120050202.Text: I had wanted to stay by his side, helping him to pick tea leaves forever. But, he insisted that I shouldn't stay on the tea farm and should open my eyes to the world at the Starskiff Haven. If I no longer stay by his side, how lonely will he be?

120050203.Text: How do you type so quickly?

120050205.Text: You should visit home often, maybe this can count as you being with him

120050206.Text: ... At some point, I understood my grandfather's insistence. He was worried that I would suffer, and that really moved me.

120050207.Text: If you don't feel well or are too stressed out, drink more warm water

120050210.Text: At one point, I was seriously ill. My family spent a lot of money on paying the medication bills... It must be difficult for grandfather, alone processing the tea leaves. Now that I've recovered, I want to help him.

120050211.Text: How do you type so quickly?

120050213.Text: You are such a kind-hearted Foxian lady

120050218.Text: He said that you were his granddaughter's best friend. If it's for friends, it's 5600 credits for one tael, 10,000 credits for two taels, and 25,000 for half a catty. How much do you want? Grandpa has worked very hard on this, so he really can't give you all of it for free. Hope you understand.

120050219.Text: How do you type so quickly?

120050220.Text: Forget about typing speed. Buy some tea, how much do you want?

120050221.Text: I want to help you, I should buy some tea leaves

120050222.Text: If you don't feel well or are too stressed out, drink more warm water

120050223.Text: It takes more than hot water to make a good cup of tea. In all seriousness, would you like some top-grade Whale-Tide Thistle?

120070003.Text:
For logistics identifier codes, please approach an in-person operative with the pass phrase, "Acquaintance from the mortal coil, luxurious gifts from beyond!"

Any dissemination of the logistics identifier codes between members is strictly prohibited. The Foxian Beauty Chat membership status will be revoked for the involved parties.

The Foxian Beauty Chat reserves the right to the final interpretation of this service.

120550015.Text: Is it really that hard to understand why the Express is here? Can't someone act simply out of the kindness of their heart?

121000000.Text: {NICKNAME}, I'm Xikui, Chief Secretary of the Sky-Faring Commission. The Palace of Astrum is running a small event for visitors to better understand Xianzhou. Would you be interested?

121000001.Text: I don't know if you've met him before, but the Sky-Faring Commission has a speed tester named Tantan. He'd hoped that the public could actively participate in traffic management and become more aware of potential road hazards. To that end, he is planning a "Xianzhou Speed Tester" experience.

121000002.Text: There are too few attendees because the event is too boring, so Madam Yukong asked me to help her get more people. Would you mind attending this? Pretty please?

121000004.Text: Is it where I get to enjoy the luxurious Xianzhou life of my dreams?

121000007.Text: To be honest, I'm not too interested in this kind of stuff. Please find someone more capable

121000011.Text: Okay, I'll go look for Tantan after this

121000012.Text: Isn't there some kind of device for this sort of task? Sounds inefficient to use humans for this.

121000013.Text: This whole thing is mainly about participation. It's an experience for people to take part in

121000015.Text: ...Hey, why do I have to spell it out so clearly for you!

121000016.Text: If you're ready, please go find Tantan

121000017.Text: So you never share good things with me, but always ask me to help when you're in trouble?

121050008.Text:
Please don't spread the following information.
After the incident, the general and the master diviner drew up a list, and want the Sky-Faring Commission and us to check all the people who traveled at certain times to certain locations. They suspect someone smuggled "contraband" onto the Luofu...

121050013.Text: The Xianzhou Alliance is not a part of the Interastral Peace Corporation's commercial sphere and does not share much information with the IPC. For one, we are not linked with their law enforcement system... If a criminal wanted by the IPC sneaked onto a Xianzhou ship, we would have no means of immediately detecting them

121050014.Text: It takes time and effort to send a formal request to the IPC to check, so the general advised us to seek help from the Astral Express Crew to filter the list for any suspicious persons

121050015.Text: If you can, please bring a few companions with you to help us go through the data.

How do I fit in here?

121060000.Text: I tried fixing some other relevant recordings in the cycrane, and I found this part about Luocha

121030204.Text: Thank you again, and I wish you all the best

121130002.Text: Okay. Please be careful on the way here

121150001.Text: {NICKNAME}, you don't happen to be at Stargazer Navalia right now, are you?

121150002.Text: Yea, I just happened to be handling some stuff here

121150005.Text: Sorry, now's not the time for jokes

121150006.Text: I saw on cycrane system that you were nearby

121150007.Text: There's an important task I need your help with. It's really urgent

121150008.Text: The Exalting Sanctum's sky dome malfunctioned half an hour ago. It was probably caused by the unusual yinyang phenomena from Ambrosial Arbor's new growth

121150009.Text: The technical details are complicated, so I won't elaborate. In short, one district has a serious problem, and it's about to explode

121150010.Text: The entire Luofu has yet to fully recover from all the chaos, and there's no one available to handle this emergency. Fortunately, there is an office worker in the Sky-Faring Commission who jumped on a starskiff and flew to the sky dome to carry out an emergency fix

121150011.Text: But that starskiff also broke down during the rescue (probably due to the yinyang phenomena again) and lost contact over Stargazer Navalia. It may have been forced to land or even crashed

121150012.Text: I've already informed the Cloud Knights to send reinforcements asap

121150013.Text: But one second can mean the difference between life and death for this kind of thing. Can you folks please go take a look first?

121150014.Text: "You folks"? Is there someone else here?

121150015.Text: Yes, Mr. Yang is also nearby

121150018.Text: I'm still trying to find out

121150019.Text: Your friend, Mr. Yang, is also nearby. I've already contacted him

121150020.Text: Anyways, try to find a vantage point in Stargazer Navalia and use a cycrane to locate the starskiff, I'm counting on you folks

121150021.Text: Also... this office worker is a bit special

121150022.Text: I implore you both to do everything in your power to save her life

121160000.Text: Hey there. I heard folks from the Artisanship Commission say that you helped clear the Ambrosial Arbor coils. You're indeed as saintly as the general says you are

121160001.Text: Saintly? That doesn't sound much like a compliment

121160002.Text: Don't beat around the bush. What's the matter?

121160003.Text: I am brave and kind, and I love to help others.

121160004.Text: Of course it's a compliment. I thank you from the bottom of my heart. Only when busy people get busy do slackers get a chance to slack off

121160005.Text: But, based on your past experience, won't you get a sort of a hunch when I message flatteries to you?

121160006.Text: ...A hunch? Like, this person wants something from me?

121160007.Text: So, what do you want from me?

121160008.Text: How about this? You recall the message now, and we forget about the whole thing

121160010.Text:
It seems that you are already used to the pleasantries people use on Xianzhou, and know when the work will come.
You will go far, young {F#lady}{M#man}! I believe you will soon understand my three basic principles for happiness at work

121160011.Text: But the trouble comes from me this time. Please don't shrug it off and do help me

121160012.Text: Great! A brave and kind person like you can definitely help me

121160013.Text: Do you remember the craftsman apprentice named Chengjie from the Artisanship Commission?

121160016.Text: It's okay if you don't remember. Come to the Artisanship Commission. I'll show him to you

Sounds like you need a favor
What do you want from me?
Can I pretend not to know?

121151006.Text: Jing Yuan did mention someone named "Caiyi," and said you were very close to her

121151008.Text: I actually guessed there would be some connection

121151009.Text: It's hard to explain over text. Let's meet up

121200000.Text: Hi, {NICKNAME}. I got your contact details from Miss Qingque

121200001.Text: I'm trying to decipher my master's plans. By the Reignbow, I feel like I'm overflowing with inspiration!

121200002.Text: I want to talk to someone about my ideas. Do you have the time?

121200003.Text: I won't be able to understand what you say...

121200004.Text: Hehehe, I just want someone to chat with. Just treat it as listening to a new friend's rants.

121200005.Text: I charge a lot for counseling!

121200006.Text: The user you have messaged is currently unavailable

121200007.Text: Have you talked to Qingque about your inspirations?

121200008.Text: I have. She said she's too busy and doesn't have time, and asked me to find you

121200009.Text: Qingque and "being busy" are like fire and ice

121200011.Text: Fire and ice are so unrelated, they're practically incompatible

121200012.Text: Um, I actually don't have time either

121200013.Text: But Miss Qingque said you're in Xianzhou as a tourist, and must have plenty of free time. She also said the secret faction you belong to loves to help people. Why else would you help the general and save us at the Artisanship Commission?

121200016.Text: I really need someone to supervise me. I'll definitely pay you for it!

Choices.Text: The user you have messaged is currently unavailable

121220000.Text: Ahhh, {NICKNAME}, I want to talk to you about something...

121220001.Text: I feel like I'm losing motivation.

121220003.Text: No. There's a lot more to go

121220004.Text: Ahhh, but whenever I think about how much work still needs to be done, I feel it'd be ages before I fulfill my master's dream

121220005.Text: I'm so useless. I still can't practice on my own after more than a century...

121220012.Text: You've got weird preferences. I've never heard of a request like that

Would just a few angry words be enough?

121230000.Text: I'm sorry. I was the one who begged you to start all this, but now I'm also the one thinking of quitting...

We haven't talked for a while

121280131.Text: Reaaly? I didn't really realize it had been so long

121280132.Text: I didn't just do nothing for the past few centuries. I started trying to talk to cycranes

121280133.Text: ...I've had some really traumatic experiences in the past. It's just too much for me

121280139.Text: I'm setting a goal. I will strive to "speak with cycranes"

121280140.Text: I may need some more time. Maybe I will finally be able to head out in a few centuries?

Greetings, {NICKNAME}.
The Seat of Divine Foresight is currently collaborating with the Ten-Lords Commission's spiritfarers in pursuit of a heinous crime, and requires your assistance.

121510110.Text: Of course, if you have any other means of destruction that would not cause any danger, please feel free to use them. Just remember to update Qingzu after it is done.

121510111.Text: At present, I have urgent matters to attend to. I won't be able to respond from now.

121520101.Text: [Emergency Alert from the Luofu Realm-Keeping Commission] According to the regulations of the Commission, physical fights and brawls are illegal and not only pose a threat to the well-being of others, but may also lead to serious consequences. We remind all residents and travelers to not believe unverified rumors and to rationally resolve conflicts. When encountering traffic congestion or navigational restrictions, please plan your travel and return accordingly, follow the order of passage, and avoid blocking emergency lanes to prevent secondary accidents. It is everyone's responsibility to maintain a harmonious and stable environment in the Luofu.

121530103.Text: Please reply if you see this message

121530106.Text: Almost forgot to report back to you. My apologies

121530107.Text: I found the sheep, but they were all eaten by the wolves. The wolves haven't had enough and wanted to eat me as well. I dealt with them already

121530108.Text: Then I was taken to see a group calling themselves The Unshackled, and they insisted I join them. What a bother

121530110.Text: Why? You're making me scared to join them...

121530111.Text: You know that the Alliance does not ban merchants who worship the Plagues Author from coming to the Xianzhou and trading here

121530112.Text: This open-minded policy is bringing quite a bit of trouble for the Realm-Keeping Commission as we try to maintain the peace here

121530113.Text: This group, The Unshackled, is one such trouble

121530114.Text: Sure, its members are law-abiding individuals and have not committed any crime

121530115.Text: However, these people believe in the Path of Abundance, and that they will accumulate "good karma" if they release living beings into the wild, thus earning good fortune for themselves

121530116.Text: They have started to release more and more creatures, even including some invasive species. It's quite a headache for the Commission

121530117.Text: That's why we'd like you to infiltrate The Unshackled and crumble them from within! The Realm-Keeping Commission will reward you lavishly

121530118.Text: Me again? Does the Realm-Keeping Commission not have any employees? I don't even know how to help you, even if I want to

121530119.Text: Crumble them from within? How? I don't even know how to help you, even if I want to

121530120.Text: Don't sell yourself short! All six Commissions are recounting your legendary exploits infiltrating the Disciples of Sanctus Medicus and taking them down by wit

121530121.Text: You're a professional when it comes to destabilizing such organizations

121530122.Text: Of course, we won't force you

121530123.Text: If you really can't dissolve them, you can always just give us intel on their future actions, so we can prevent them from doing anything outrageous

121530124.Text: Anyways, thank you in advance for this business. The Realm-Keeping Commission will reward you lavishly for sure!

122040006.Text: My parents were Cloud Knights, but they passed away when we were young.

122040007.Text: Since I had to support both of us, I had to work all day and didn't have much time to discipline my sister.

122040008.Text: As a result, she ended up becoming a troublemaker and didn't even finish school.

122040009.Text: So, I secretly applied for her to join the Cloud Knights, hoping that being in the forces would straighten her out... and maybe she'd become a better person.

122040010.Text: When she found out what I did, we had a huge argument. She thought I was meddling in her life.

122040011.Text: I thought she'd refuse to serve and spill the beans to the Military Affairs Office, but... she actually joined the Cloud Knights.

122040012.Text: After that, we started to drift apart and eventually, one day, she disappeared without a trace.

122040013.Text: You did what you thought was best for her. She'll understand it when she grows up. Don't blame yourself over it.

122040014.Text: It's good for unruly youngsters to go through some tough experiences to shape them up.

122040015.Text: I always thought she didn't want to see me because she resented me for enlisting her in the Cloud Knights.

122040016.Text: But when I saw her today, she told me she got transferred to the Ten-Lords Commission and didn't have the chance to contact me and explain everything.

122040017.Text: Now that I see she's doing well, I can finally breathe a sigh of relief. As long as she doesn't regret it, I'm okay with it.

122040018.Text: Anyway, it was a misunderstanding from the start. Sorry for dragging you into my family drama.

127000001.Text:
I am the president of the Hexanexus secret society. We are called the Hex Club.

"Have you heard of the Hexanexus?"

I have posed this question to countless people. Those I asked eventually began to learn about it, were saved by it, were moved by it, and became inspired by it.

There are innumerable masterpieces in the Artisanship Commission, but never has there been a pice de rsistance that symbolizes the artistry and workmanship of craftsmen  until the Hexanexus disrupted the status quo. To us, the Hexanexus represents the heart and soul of craft masters, and the original intent of creation. Only with such a soul can one begin their first step on the path to mastery. We who still walk the path will inevitably experience joy and sorrow, but as long as the Hexanexus exists, we can look at the future with hope and smiles.

Our society's goal is to spread unforeseen joy and passion to all the people in the world through the Hexanexus, to fill life with curiosity and euphoria.

With Utmost Respect,
The Hex Club

200630021.Text: So I was raised in a military family, and my mom is very strict about me practicing my martial skills.

200630022.Text: So I had to get up to spar with her before the crack of dawn, then go to the lyceum after that.

200630023.Text: But by that point, I'm exhausted. I couldn't even hear anything the abecedary said without falling asleep.

200630024.Text: Just now, when he saw me, he yelled, "Hey, isn't this Sleepy Sushang?"

200630025.Text: Everyone on the street immediately started staring at me, I was just so embarrassed.

200630029.Text: *sigh* I hope I won't run into him ever again...

200640000.Text: {NICKNAME}, I finished reading the files that you shared with me from the data bank.

200640001.Text:
After sitting in this Seat of Divine Foresight for so long, I can't help but overlook the world outside of Luofu's delves.
That, combined with the long lifespan of the Xianzhou humans, made me feel that the entire world is as boring and changeless as myself.
However, now I've read the wondrous encounters of the Express Crew, I realized that using my endless lifespan to travel various worlds would be a fun venture indeed.

200640002.Text: Unfortunately... I still shoulder Luofu's countless duties and cannot accompany your group. But if I were to retire one day, what should I do?

200640003.Text: Our Express is pretty big. You can come visit, general

200640004.Text: Hahahaha, if that's a personal invitation, {NICKNAME}, then I might consider it.

200640005.Text: Perhaps you can swap places with Fu Xuan and be the master diviner

200640006.Text: Hahaha, don't ever mention that to me again. The master diviner is an exceedingly busy job. No ordinary person can face its arduous work.

200640007.Text: I feel the Realm-Keeping Commission's work is quite relaxed...

200640008.Text: Hahaha, that would truly take me back to my origins.

200640009.Text: My parents were scholars of the Realm-Keeping Commission and were responsible for researching and recording the histories of long-life species. The paperwork involved was literal torment.

200640010.Text: That reminds me... My dream as a young boy was to become a Galaxy Ranger.

200640011.Text: Pity that life never goes the way you want it to go.

200640012.Text: If given the chance, where would you want to go?

200640013.Text: Perhaps I'll go seek out animals that have already gone extinct in Xianzhou.

200640014.Text: Let us stop for today. Qingzu just carried in another pile of documents for me. Just looking at them gives me a headache.

200640016.Text: I'm sorry I can't be of help...

200640017.Text: It's enough for me to squeeze out some time to chat with you, {NICKNAME}.

200640018.Text: All in all, I shall return to work. Farewell!

200650020.Text: As for a spar between you and me... perhaps it's better to plan for that after you've sparred with Yanqing.

200880000.Text: Say, have you heard of a knowledge-sharing website named Knowfinity?

200880001.Text: The myriad of topics on this website encompass a diverse range, leaving no stone unturned. Occasionally, I, too, receive invitations to answer some of the questions posted there.

200880002.Text: Look at this one: <u>How can a leader maximize their direct report's motivation to work</u>.

200880003.Text: Why exactly do they want to invite me to answer this question...?

200880004.Text: You are an outstanding leader... Of course, as the master diviner managing the Divination Commission, a workplace question like this is a piece of cake for you

200880005.Text: As the master diviner, you are highly experienced in the workplace, and the other diviners rally around you in unity.

200880008.Text: "To govern is to harmonize  higher-ups and underlings must not encroach."

200880009.Text: "Let those keen of sight be on the lookout, and let those sharp of claws to go on the hunt. Let all use their greatest strength, then all shall attain peace."

200880010.Text: The most important aspect of the workplace is to ensure everyone is employed to do what they do best, and do not intrude upon each other's jobs.

200880011.Text: "How can a leader maximize their direct report's motivation to work" is, in fact, all about "letting the right person do the right job."

201090012.Text: Judges have forever grappled with the burden of excruciating decisions. Among them, few weigh on their conscience as heavily as the relentless pursuit of the betrayer. Motivated by greed, disdain, or the intoxication of danger, comrades can swiftly transform into enemies. And when the moment arrives to dispense justice upon a former ally in the name of the revered Ten Lords, the torment becomes unbearable.

201090013.Text: The place I now journey towards bears witness to a heart-rending spectacle. Long ago, I meticulously constructed a trap to ensnare the perpetrator who conspired with the Denizens of Abundance. This elusive criminal, known only as "Seawater," peddled invaluable secrets, unraveling the intricate tapestry of the Alliance within the Ryansnaut Sector. Engaged in an unyielding battle with "Seawater" for an extended duration, I now find myself poised to tighten the noose.

201090014.Text: As I hasten towards the scene, a vivid tableau unfolds within my mind. A greenhorn Cloud Knight, a spirited street performer, a guileless Foxian girl, and one enigmatic Nameless... Which among them could be "Seawater"? And when the truth is ultimately unveiled, how shall I confront the inevitable, merciless denouement...?

201090015.Text: Without warning, an arrow, launched from the shadows, pierces my heart. I collapse to the ground, I find my gaze locked onto the countenance of the assailant...

201090017.Text: Are you seriously planning to send me the entire novel through text messages?!

201090021.Text: That's all I've managed to write so far. I'm a bit stuck and need some advice.

201090022.Text: It's great. Keep going with it.

201090024.Text: While I'm not entirely satisfied with it, you've given me the confidence to keep going.

201090025.Text: To be honest, it's a bit long-winded. It lacks detail, and now I understand why you're stuck.

201090026.Text: I feel the same way. The story definitely needs refinement.

201090027.Text: Well, I'll try reading more of my sister's favorite novels and maybe I'll learn something about storytelling intricacies.

201090028.Text: Why are we the suspects in your story?

201090029.Text: My sister mentioned that it's easier to write a novel when the characters are based on familiar faces.

201090030.Text: I've been thinking about it. Maybe it's because you guys are always too kind for me to imagine you doing anything evil. No wonder I'm stuck now. Perhaps I should draw inspiration from the criminals I usually deal with.

201090032.Text: The biggest question is, who is this "Seawater" anyway?

201090034.Text: Maybe that's why I'm struggling with the writing.

201090035.Text: Thanks for your advice. I'll think about it and send it to you once it's ready.

Choices.Text: What are you going to send me?

201100001.Text: Or, are you free sometime in the next few days?

201100002.Text: And if not, how about next week?

201100003.Text: And if not, how about next month?

201100004.Text: I'm busy these next couple of days.

201100005.Text: Never mind. If you are free afterward, would you like to watch an immersia together with me?

201100006.Text: Feel free to call me anytime of the day

201100007.Text: Great. Would you like to watch an immersia together with me?

201100008.Text: What's with the sudden interest in immersia?

201100009.Text: Well, since my sister is a puppet and only able to spend a limited amount of time in the mortal world, I always try to make the most of it by taking her to watch interesting things, have fun, and enjoy good food.

201100010.Text: Lately, I've been thinking about exploring some new immersias with her, but due to my job, I've lost interest in many things, and I'm not sure if the immersias I choose will be enjoyable. It's such a rare occasion for my sister to be in the mortal world, and if I waste her precious time on dull immersias, I'll feel incredibly guilty, to the point of mara corruption. That's why I need someone else's suggestion. I believe someone as knowledgeable as you could help me find captivating immersias

201100011.Text: That makes sense, but everyone has their own preferences. I wonder what kind of immersias Miss Xueyi likes?

201100012.Text: My sister loves thrillers. Murder mysteries, spy flicks, zombies, and basically anything with thrilling plots. However, I find it difficult to discern what is "thrilling." If you were like me, immersed in the first-person experiences of various mara-struck individuals all day, you will also come to feel that no immersia can be "thrilling." That's why I need your help to tell me what is "thrilling" with the eyes of an ordinary person.

201100013.Text: I'll get back to you once I've got the tickets.

Choices.Text: I'm busy these next couple of days
For you, I'm free any time
What's with the sudden interest in immersia?
What type of immersia does Xueyi like?

201110000.Text: Sometimes I may have some thoughts that I'm not sure if you'll get, but it might be worth a try. So, I'd like to share them with you.

201110001.Text: In the Shackling Prison, I've been immersed in memories of mara-struck individuals for days on end. Meanwhile, in the outside world, I constantly hear people complaining about trivial things like having too much homework or feeling exhausted with only four hours of playtime each day. They complain about being tired.

201110002.Text: For me, even a short thirty-minute break every few days would be a precious gift from the Ten Lords.

201110003.Text: Younger people tend to have a lower threshold for stress.

201110004.Text: That's true. Many people don't realize how good they have it

201110005.Text: Well, the more I think about it, the more I understand them. Actually, I used to complain about those things too when I was younger.

201110006.Text: I vaguely remember when I was a child, believing that I wasn't cut out for work. My sister would comfort me, although I can't recall exactly what she said. It was only after I started working that I realized no one is truly cut out for work, especially in the Ten-Lords Commission. Even if you don't have what it takes, once you drink the Wine of Oblivion, you simply do what needs to be done.

201110007.Text: However, I never let my daily stress build up to the point of mara corruption. That's why I visit Du's Teahouse after work to enjoy some tea. His tea works wonders.

201110008.Text: If you're free, don't hesitate to join me.

209990002.Text: How do you do? Are there new missions at the Realm-Keeping Commission?

209990003.Text: You and the members of the Express crew have been a great help with the many tasks previously entrusted to you. We are deeply grateful for your assistance.

209990004.Text: I am reaching out this time to update you, Mr. Yang, and Miss March on some follow-up situations.

209990005.Text: Do you remember the previous invitation for you and a few others to come to the Realm-Keeping Commission to identify suspicious individuals?

209990006.Text: You mean that time when March played detective, making wild guesses about one traveling merchant's background and whereabouts, but couldn't nail down a single solid answer?

209990007.Text: Yep, that's the one. Officer Jingyan even praised Miss March for her keen observation and unorthodox thinking during that incident. She mentioned that Miss March seemed like a natural for our line of work.

209990009.Text: It seems you may be too preoccupied elsewhere. I still remember how Miss March deduced the whereabouts of an outworlder back then.

209990010.Text: Officer Jingyan even praised Miss March for her keen observation and unorthodox thinking during that incident. She mentioned that Miss March seemed like a natural for our line of work.

209990011.Text: Believe it or not, I received an official notice jointly issued by the Ten-Lords Commission and the Cloud Knights. That blond merchant, Luocha, is indeed an unlawful character who infiltrated the Xianzhou!

209990012.Text: Miss March's deduction and Mr. Yang's intuition... have come true! The Express Crew truly is a group of hidden talents! Much admiration!

209990015.Text: Don't knock it, the official seal and signatures are all there. This is as real as they come.

209990016.Text: So what did that man do?

209990017.Text: I can't go into the specifics as it's still part of Xianzhou's internal affairs.

209990018.Text: But, given our tight relationship, I can spill a bit of the beans for you. The official document states that he was arrested on charges of "identity fraud and smuggling of dangerous bio-merchandise, among other crimes." The use of the expression "among other" is quite intriguing.

209990019.Text: Of course, I have received the directive from the Realm-Keeping Commission's general affairs office, requesting to commend and express gratitude to enthusiastic guests such as yourselves.

209990020.Text: I would like to express my own gratitude to you all, and deliver to you your well-earned remuneration.

209990021.Text: In that case, if there are tasks involving apprehending fugitives or pursuing criminals in the future, I hope you and the Express Crew can continue to make full use of your intuition!

209990022.Text: Stay safe, I shall take my leave!

Choices.Text: So what did that man do?

115030002.Text: It is a Calyx, a strange entity born from the phenomenon of space distortion.

115030003.Text: There are some reality data in the Calyxes that might come in handy, but please be careful when coming in contact with them. The existence of these Calyxes is still a mystery to us, and the danger within is incalculable.

115030006.Text: In your coming journey, you might come across other Calyxes like this, and the reality data stored in different Calyxes may vary, so look out for that.

500080000.Text: Uh, {NICKNAME}... Herta said she's got something good for you, and wants you to go back and try the Simulated Universe.

500080001.Text: She also asked if you blocked her.

500080002.Text: Why don't you go see her. She seems excited.

500080005.Text: Haha, it's all good. She promised not to bully you.

500090001.Text: It hasn't been that long since we last said goodbye, right?

500090005.Text: Come back when you've got the time. Pom-Pom has some things for you

500100007.Text: You can't be this reckless! Mmm, come back when you can. Pom-Pom has something to say to you. Don't push it off!

500110005.Text: It's easy to feel lost when your belly traveling alone on a journey of growth. Sometimes it's wise to reach out and ask outstanding seniors for advice. Their lights are like lighthouses on the night ocean, and are very hard to replace

500110007.Text: Hurry and come back to the Express when you can! It's easier with face-to-face communication
